meanings.definition: The action of stating something again or differently.
meanings.sent1: In his speech, he made several restatements to emphasize his point.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the student to make restatements of the main ideas in the paragraph.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's restatements of famous quotes had the audience laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her restatements of the facts painted a clearer picture of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The artist's restatements of the same scene in different colors were captivating.

meanings.definition: A revised version of a statement or document.
meanings.sent1: The company issued restatements of their financial reports to correct errors.
meanings.sent2: The editor requested a restatement of the article with more accurate information.
meanings.sent3: The restatements of the contract made it easier to understand the terms.
meanings.sent4: The new restatements of the policy were met with approval from the team.
meanings.sent5: The restatements of the recipe improved the clarity of the cooking instructions.
